short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable seamless opening of Git repositories in Coder directly from your web browser, enhancing your development workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Coder Chrome extension allows you and your team to create or open a workspace directly from the GitHub website, either from the repository page or a pull request. It also lets you override template parameters to customize your workspace for a specific repository.

In future versions, we will also allow users to open the repository in Coder directly in a specified app, like code-server.
